faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Goodspeech

items.question: How does Goodspeech work?
items.answer: Goodspeech uses advanced AI to analyze messages for aggressive or passive-aggressive language. It then rewrites these messages using the principles of Nonviolent Communication, focusing on observations, feelings, needs, and requests.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Goodspeech never collects user messages. We use a secure API to translate messages in real-time. Your messages are never stored on our servers. We take data privacy seriously and ensure that all data is encrypted and transmitted securely. We also comply with all relevant data protection regulations. We are committed to protecting your data and ensuring that it is handled with the utmost care and respect.

items.question: Can I customize how Goodspeech responds?
items.answer: Yes, on our Professional and Enterprise plans, you can customize the tone and style of Goodspeech's translations to match your company culture.

items.question: How long does it take to set up?
items.answer: Most teams are up and running with Goodspeech in less than 5 minutes. Just add the bot to your Slack workspace and you're ready to go.

items.question: Can Goodspeech translate messages in languages other than English?
items.answer: Currently, Goodspeech supports English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese. We're adding more languages regularly based on customer demand.

workModel.title: Suggestion-Only Model

workModel.title: Private Suggestions
workModel.description: All suggestions are only visible to you and are never shared with message recipients.

workModel.title: Manual Copy & Paste Required
workModel.description: To use a suggestion, you must manually copy and paste it into your messaging platform.

workModel.title: Full Control Over Content
workModel.description: You always have the opportunity to review, edit, or discard any suggestion before sending.

promise.title: Our promise:
promise.text: Goodspeech enhances your natural communication abilities rather than replacing your unique voice. You maintain complete control over every message you send, and it does not make you being right or wrong in any argument.
